abstract: In this paper, we study $\ast$-g-frames in tensor products of Hilbert $C^{\ast}$-modules. We show that a tensor product of two $\ast$-g-frames is a $\ast$-g-frames, and we get some result.
meta: March 2018Annales Universitatis Paedagogicae Cracoviensis Studia Mathematica 17(1):15-24
Projects: Gabor Frames and Shift-invariant Spaces- Sur une extension des Frames aux A-modules de Hilbert
